name: Ancient Observatory
description: A ruined astronomical observatory that once tracked celestial events and guided navigation now stands as a monument to lost knowledge. The astronomical knowledge and potential magical properties attract scholars and mages, while the elevated position provides excellent views and defensive advantages.
atmosphere: Broken telescopes and astrolabes lie scattered among star charts and astronomical instruments. Stone platforms once held celestial devices now point uselessly at empty sky. The air carries old parchment and metallic tang of corroded brass. Carved constellations cover walls and ceilings in intricate detail.
